title: Disney Just Introduced Pixar's First Non-Binary Character - The Direct
content:
Elemental introduced Pixar's first-ever non-binary character.

Disney's Pixar division has taken great strides in representation over recent years, from debuting its first black lead in Soul's Joe Gardner (Jamie Foxx) to featuring its first same-sex kiss between Lightyear's Hawthorne and Kiko.

The famous animation studio is now preparing to debut its latest movie in Elemental, the story of a city inhabited by water, fire, air, and land residents where two polar opposites discover how much they actually have in common.

Pixar's First Non-Binary Character Revealed

Voice actor Ava Hauser has officially announced they will play the character of Lake Ripple in Pixar's new movie Elemental. In a historic move for the studio, Lake will mark the first non-binary character in Pixar history when they make their debut in the July theatrical release.

Pixar

As confirmed by Elemental's junior novelization and Unlikely Friends tie-in book, Lake both be non-binary and have a girlfriend in the Pixar movie.

Lake Ripple has also been confirmed as the young sibling of Elemental's secondary protagonist Wade Ripple, with both coming from the water element.

Why Elemental Is So Important for Pixar

Pixar has clearly made a point of improving its representation over recent years, and introducing its first non-binary character is an important step in that. After all, Hollywood continues to have a massive lacking of non-binary characters with very few iconic ones out there to this day.

Although Lake does not play a major part in Elemental, their presence is a significant one, especially for members of the LGBTQIA+ community who will now be able to see themselves represented on the big screen.

Elemental is already an important movie for Pixar as it will mark the first non-franchise original from the studio to be released exclusively in theaters, and not as a straight-to-Disney+ release. That said, the movie is facing an uphill battle after becoming Pixar's lowest-rated original on Rotten Tomatoes.

The movie was once placed to tease an Elemental sequel and more stories with the watery Wade and fiery Ember, along with their new "steam baby," however, that was ultimately scrapped ahead of release.

Elemental is playing now in U.S. theaters.

title: Brad Garlinghouse Reveals Astonishing Facts About SEC And Hinman After Docs Release - U.Today
content:
Advertisement

Ripple boss Brad Garlinghouse has taken to Twitter to share a rare video. This time, he was driven to record it after reading Dr. Hinman's emails released by the SEC after the pressure the court put on this regulatory agency.

Garlinghouse revealed several astonishing facts about Dr. Hinman, the SEC and the crypto regulation that the agency seems to be unwilling or incapable of deploying in the U.S.

Garlinghouse admitted that he does not make a video every week, but this week has been a tough one, so he decided to address the crypto community.

Shots fired! This is remarkable; Ripple trying the case in the court of public opinion! Pure political pressure. Without direct accusation, Brad points out Hinman "Received millions of dollars of law firm part of an alliance with others that had a vested interest in the speech. https://t.co/oz5FlYMe3d — WrathofKahneman 🪝 (@WKahneman) June 16, 2023

Ripple CEO reveals curious facts about SEC and Hinman

He mentioned that the documents about Hinman's speech, internal SEC emails and other documents related to it were finally released by the SEC after two years, seven court orders and more than $100 million of legal bills.

Garlinghouse revealed that, according to the above-mentioned documents, the SEC could not agree inside of the agency on the crypto law that should be used for regulating crypto (as to when a token stops being security) and they told Hinman directly that his speech would confuse the public even more.

He also pointed out that, according to the documents, while he worked for the SEC, "Hinman received millions of dollars of payments from his law firm, which was part of an alliance with others that had invested interest in this speech."

Ripple CEO meets with Clayton and Hinman in person

Garlinghouse also drew attention to the fact that it is clear from the documents that the SEC to a high degree has relentlessly pursued enforcement actions against crypto players, "while professing fake open arms and calls to come in and register" as it was lying about their so-called guidance all the way through.

This happened despite, per Garlinghouse, Ripple spending years proactively engaging with the SEC on the subject of crypto regulatory compliance. Garlinghouse personally met with Jay Clayton (the SEC back then, who then initiated the lawsuit against Ripple in 2020 one day before he retired) and William Hinman without any lawyers present to discuss those matters.

Ripple CEO and other top executives answered all the questions from the SEC reps, and there was not a single time when Clayton or Hinman suggested to Garlinghouse, per his words, that XRP was a security. Later on, Garlinghouse said, they used the information he revealed to them in private against Ripple in court.

Even after Ripple received a surprise Wells Notice, saying that the SEC was considering suing them for violating the securities laws, the regulator still refused to provide any substance to those allegations, Garlinghouse added.

And now, the SEC, he said, is sending those notices to multiple crypto companies in the U.S. and suing them — Coinbase, Binance among the most recent ones. The SEC wants to kill crypto innovation in the U.S., Ripple CEO concluded.

title: Anticipated Sequel “Ripples: New Generation” in a Night of Glamour And Nostalgia - Guardian Nigeria
content:
What's New Anticipated Sequel “Ripples: New Generation” in a Night of Glamour And Nostalgia By Guardian Life A wave of nostalgia swept through the air as Africa Magic, the renowned African entertainment channel, hosted a captivating watch party to reveal its latest offering, Ripples: New Generation. The event, held at the prestigious FilmHouse Cinemas in Landmark Centre, VI, Lagos on Friday, June 16, 2023, was an evening filled with heartfelt speeches, enthralling…

A wave of nostalgia swept through the air as Africa Magic, the renowned African entertainment channel, hosted a captivating watch party to reveal its latest offering, Ripples: New Generation. The event, held at the prestigious FilmHouse Cinemas in Landmark Centre, VI, Lagos on Friday, June 16, 2023, was an evening filled with heartfelt speeches, enthralling performances, and an electric atmosphere.

Taking viewers three decades into the future from the conclusion of the original hit show, Ripples, which aired on NTA in 1993, Ripples: New Generation plunges audiences into a gripping tale following the legacy of the late matriarch, Leslie Dehinde-Philips. The focal point of the story revolves around Doris, a young and extraordinary woman, who finds herself on the precipice of inheriting the immense Dehinde-Phillips fortune, including a staggering 75% share of DP Oil. Raised to assume the position of Chief Executive Officer, Doris appears destined for greatness. Yet, beneath her picture-perfect life, she longs for an intangible aspiration – freedom.

Regrettably, Doris’s dreams of liberation are abruptly shattered when a dramatic protest against DP Oil, spearheaded by the Elders of a Niger Delta Community, erupts. Determined to extricate herself from the predicament and pursue her desires, Doris unwittingly falls prey to the clutches of a ruthless corporate executive, harboring a desperate ambition to claim the CEO title. As her grandmother’s final will influences her decisions about freedom, Doris is left questioning every aspect of her existence.

Intriguingly, the series aims to shed light on the daunting challenges posed by oil spillage and its detrimental environmental consequences, the relentless struggle for emancipation, and the unwavering pursuit of success against all odds. Boasting a diverse ensemble cast, Ripples: New Generation showcases the immense talent of Tope Olowoniyan, who takes the lead as the resolute Doris Dehinde-Philips. Accompanying her are Daniel Abua, Vine Olugu, and Ian Wordi, portraying the characters of Elo Dehinde-Phillips, Alex, and Inspector Richard, respectively.

Notably, beloved veterans of the original series, including Alex Usifo, Barbara Soky, Emeka Ossai, and Keppy Ekpeyong-Bassey, will reprise their iconic roles as Talab Abass, Daphne Wellington-Cole, Wale Okoya, and Admiral (formerly Captain) Hassan. Joining the esteemed cast are the fresh faces of Debby Felix, Lexan Peters, Francis Onwochei, and Mena Sodje, who embody the spirit of the new generation.

The creative mastermind behind both Ripples and Ripples: New Generation, Zeb Ejiro, expressed his elation at the opportunity to bring his cherished series back to life. He enthused, “I feel so happy that we have been able to create Ripples: The New Generation because today we have made history. Ripples is the only TV series or soap opera that was done thirty years ago and is back again. No other program has been able to achieve this. Yet, we are doing a mix of the old and new generation. We are going to hold viewers hostage every Wednesday at 9 pm.”

The highly-anticipated watch party, expertly hosted by renowned On-Air Personality Ifunanya Igwe, boasted an impressive guest list that included esteemed personalities such as Fred Amata, Professor Shola Fosudo, Patrick Doyle, and Zeke Zulu

title: XRP Price Forecast: Expert Predicts Significant Surge in Coming Months - The Currency Analytics
content:
Ripple/XRP is a digital payment protocol and cryptocurrency that aims to facilitate fast, low-cost international money transfers. Developed by Ripple Labs, the platform was designed to provide a seamless and efficient method for transferring value across borders. Unlike traditional banking systems that rely on intermediaries and can be slow and costly, Ripple uses blockchain technology to enable direct transfers between parties.

At the core of Ripple’s technology is its consensus algorithm known as the Ripple Protocol Consensus Algorithm (RPCA). This algorithm ensures agreement among network participants on the validity and order of transactions. By achieving consensus, Ripple eliminates the need for mining and reduces the energy consumption associated with traditional cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin.

The cryptocurrency market has always been a hotbed of speculation and debate, and XRP, the digital asset associated with Ripple, is no exception. In recent months, there has been growing interest and excitement surrounding the future price of XRP. Notably, Thomas Kralow, a crypto hedge fund manager at Kralow Capital, has made a bold prediction, forecasting a significant price surge for XRP in the coming months. In this article, we will explore Kralow’s insights, examine the increasing interest in XRP, and discuss the potential implications for the broader cryptocurrency market.

Thomas Kralow’s prediction of a price surge in XRP aligns with the increasing interest in the cryptocurrency among enthusiasts. Recent data from Google Trends reveals a doubling of global searches for XRP, indicating a heightened curiosity among digital traders. This surge in interest can be attributed to various factors, including the recent developments surrounding Ripple’s legal battle with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the overall growth and acceptance of cryptocurrencies.

Building upon these observations, Kralow suggests that XRP’s price could experience a remarkable escalation in the coming months. He puts forth estimations ranging from $10 to $30, representing a monumental leap from its current trading value of $0.483. While such price predictions are met with both excitement and skepticism, they highlight the potential for significant gains in the XRP market.

While XRP has seen a marginal increase of 0.9% in the past day, there have been instances where its value dipped below the 50-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) of $0.47, albeit without closing below this mark. This volatility underscores the need for a bullish resurgence to drive XRP’s price to new heights.

A sustained position below the 50-day SMA might lead to further decline, potentially pushing XRP’s value down to $0.41. On the other hand, a bullish resurgence would require XRP to rise swiftly above the 20-day Exponential Moving Average (EMA) and break the overhead resistance at $0.55. These key levels serve as important indicators for the short-term price movement of XRP.

One of the key factors impacting XRP’s future is the ongoing legal battle between Ripple and the SEC. The outcome of this lawsuit holds significant implications for Ripple’s operations and the status of XRP as a cryptocurrency. The broader cryptocurrency community eagerly anticipates a favorable resolution, as it would allow Ripple to continue its operations unhindered and potentially lead to XRP regaining listings on various cryptocurrency exchanges. This positive outcome, combined with a bullish market trend, could propel XRP’s price to reach $2 by the end of the year.

With Thomas Kralow’s prediction of a significant price surge for XRP in the next quarter and the growing interest in the cryptocurrency, the market’s attention remains focused on XRP’s future trajectory. However, it is crucial to acknowledge the inherent volatility and risks associated with cryptocurrency investments. Investors should conduct thorough research, consider multiple factors, and seek professional advice before making any investment decisions in the ever-changing world of cryptocurrencies. As the market continues to evolve and regulatory uncertainties are resolved, the future of XRP and its potential for growth will become clearer.
